metadata.description: Get EBU R128 loudness normalization from audio files using FFmpeg API.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/loudnorm
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/loudnorm queue.

measured_tp.description: Measured true peak of input file in dBTP. Required for linear mode.
measured_tp.title: Measured Tp

linear.description: Use linear normalization mode (single-pass). If false, uses dynamic mode (two-pass for better quality).
linear.title: Linear

offset.description: Offset gain in dB applied before the true-peak limiter
offset.title: Offset

measured_i.description: Measured integrated loudness of input file in LUFS. Required for linear mode.
measured_i.title: Measured I

print_summary.description: Return loudness measurement summary with the normalized audio
print_summary.title: Print Summary

measured_lra.description: Measured loudness range of input file in LU. Required for linear mode.
measured_lra.title: Measured Lra

measured_thresh.description: Measured threshold of input file in LUFS. Required for linear mode.
measured_thresh.title: Measured Thresh

dual_mono.description: Treat mono input files as dual-mono for correct EBU R128 measurement on stereo systems
dual_mono.title: Dual Mono

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to normalize
audio_url.title: Audio Url

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Get waveform data from audio files using FFmpeg API.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/waveform
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/waveform queue.

precision.description: Number of decimal places for the waveform values. Higher values provide more precision but increase payload size.
precision.title: Precision

smoothing_window.description: Size of the smoothing window. Higher values create a smoother waveform. Must be an odd number.
smoothing_window.title: Smoothing Window

media_url.description: URL of the audio file to analyze
media_url.title: Media Url

points_per_second.description: Controls how many points are sampled per second of audio. Lower values (e.g. 1-2) create a coarser waveform, higher values (e.g. 4-10) create a more detailed one.
points_per_second.title: Points Per Second

precision.description: Number of decimal places used in the waveform values
precision.title: Precision

duration.description: Duration of the audio in seconds
duration.title: Duration

points.description: Number of points in the waveform data
points.title: Points

waveform.description: Normalized waveform data as an array of values between -1 and 1. The number of points is determined by audio duration Ã— points_per_second.
waveform.title: Waveform

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Get encoding metadata from video and audio files using FFmpeg API.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/metadata
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/ffmpeg-api/metadata queue.

extract_frames.description: Whether to extract the start and end frames for videos. Note that when true the request will be slower.
extract_frames.title: Extract Frames

media_url.description: URL of the media file (video or audio) to analyze
media_url.title: Media Url

media.description: Metadata for the analyzed media file (either Video or Audio)
media.title: Media

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes
file_size.title: File Size

timebase.description: Time base used for frame timestamps
timebase.title: Timebase

start_frame_url.description: URL of the extracted first frame
start_frame_url.title: Start Frame Url

duration.description: Duration of the media in seconds
duration.title: Duration

url.description: URL where the media file can be accessed
url.title: Url

codec.description: Codec used to encode the media
codec.title: Codec

end_frame_url.description: URL of the extracted last frame
end_frame_url.title: End Frame Url

content_type.description: MIME type of the media file
content_type.title: Content Type

container.description: Container format of the media file (e.g., 'mp4', 'mov')
container.title: Container

bitrate.description: Overall bitrate of the media in bits per second
bitrate.title: Bitrate

frame_count.description: Total number of frames in the video
frame_count.title: Frame Count

audio.description: Audio track information if video has audio

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes
file_size.title: File Size

duration.description: Duration of the media in seconds
duration.title: Duration

bitrate.description: Overall bitrate of the media in bits per second
bitrate.title: Bitrate

url.description: URL where the media file can be accessed
url.title: Url

codec.description: Codec used to encode the media
codec.title: Codec

content_type.description: MIME type of the media file
content_type.title: Content Type

container.description: Container format of the media file (e.g., 'mp4', 'mov')
container.title: Container

bitrate.description: Video bitrate in bits per second
bitrate.title: Bitrate

height.description: Height of the video in pixels
height.title: Height

width.description: Width of the video in pixels
width.title: Width

bitrate.description: Audio bitrate in bits per second
bitrate.title: Bitrate

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
